Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 阿 indicates the sound; 疒 (sickness) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 疒 [ nè ] sickness, disease
    • 阿 [ ā ] an initial particle, a prefix used for names; used in transliterations
①古同“屙”，排泄(粪便)。

痾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ē］
［《廣韻》烏何切，平歌，影。］
(1)疾病。
(2)病态，指畸形。
(3)毛病，缺点。
(4)宿怨，旧仇。
(5)用同“屙”。排泄（大便）。

痾字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痾； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页775第32
【廣韻】烏何切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】於何切，?音阿。【玉篇】同疴，病也。【前漢·五行志】及人謂之痾。痾，病貌。言?深也。【後漢·五行志】貌之不恭，是謂不肅。時則有下體生上之痾。【潘岳·閑居賦】常膳載加，舊痾有痊。　又【集韻】阿个切，音椏。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ē]
["Guangyun" Wu Heqi, Ping Ge, Shadow. ]
(1) Disease.
(2) Sickness means deformity.
(3) Faults and shortcomings.
(4) Old grudges, old hatreds.
(5) Use the same as "屙". Excretion (stool).
malady
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痾; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 775 32
[Guang Yun] Wu He Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Yu He Qi,? Yin Ah. 【Jade articles】Same disease, but also disease. 【Pre-Han·Five Elements History】and people called Zhiyi.痾, ill appearance. Words? Deep also. [Later Han·Five Elements] Being disrespectful in appearance means not being solemn. At times, the lower body gives birth to the upper body. [Pan Yue·Xianju Fu] Regular meals are added, and the old 痾 is cured.　[Jiyun] Ageqie, sound. The same meaning.
